p: The benzene extract of the bark of Sapium baccatum contained the nor-triterpene peroxide baccatin ( 126), which has been isolated and studied [ 212]. Two highly oxygenated ursane-type triterpenoids, (2β,3β)-3,25-epidioxy-2,24-dihydroxyursa-12,20(30)-dien-28-oic acid ( 127) and (2β,3β)-3,25-epidioxy-2,24-dihydroxyurs-12-en-28-oic acid ( 128), were detected in the EtOH extract of Gentiana aristata [ 213].
